thread.title: Just when you thought Anthony Weiner was out of your life
thread.title_full: Just when you thought Anthony Weiner was out of your life - The Washington Post

author: washingtonpost.com
title: Just when you thought Anthony Weiner was out of your life
text:
Former Rep. Anthony Weiner (D-N.Y.) plays an intense NASA director in Syfy’s “Sharknado 3.” (Alex Wong/Getty Images) July 23 at 5:53 PM There’s life after scandal for former Rep. Anthony Weiner .
The New York Democrat made his feature-film debut on the campy disaster flick “Sharknado 3” that aired on the Syfy channel Wednesday night. We thought for sure he’d play a pol in the movie — maybe a congressman (since he knows the drill) or a mayor (he had an unsuccessful run at Gracie Hall), or maybe even some role that gave a sly nod to the imbroglio involving naughty pics and texts that drove him out of office.
But nope! Weiner plays the director of NASA whose job is mostly to tighten his jaw and look intense while wearing a headpiece.
And then word came on Thursday that he’d gotten himself something of a proper job: he’ll be an adviser to Big Apple PR firm MWW.
